result.execSummary:
Montel T. Howard was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Montel T. Howard was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Montel T. Howard
Current: PO Box 925, c/o Redgranite Corr Inst, Redgranite, WI 54970 United States  (Effective: 01-03-2017)
Prior: 518 North 6th Avenue  Apt. B, Wausau, WI 54401

Case called: 2:50 pm
Includes 15CF134, 12CF882, 13CM479, 15CM1013.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in custody and with Atty Tina Abernathy-Mays;

PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 15CF134:
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY.
Bond:  Continued

PLEA HEARING FOR ALL FILES:
VRCW in all files. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
12CF882:
Ct. 2 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>DRI.

13CM479: 
Ct. 2 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>>DRI.

15CF134:
Ct. 1 (Strangulation and Suffocation)>>DRI.
Ct. 3 (Theft-Movable Property)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (BJ)>>DRI.

15CM1013:
Ct. 1 (Issue of Worthless Checks)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (Issue of Worthless Checks)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.
 
PLEA: 
12CF882:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs-Repeater)>> GUILTY.

13CM479:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>> GUILTY.

15CF134:
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony)>> GUILTY.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
12CF882:
Ct. 1 (Possession of Narcotic Drugs-Repeater)>> 4 years WSPS, 1 year IC and 3 years ES, concurrent to each Count and any sentence currently being served. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, AODA and follow up, Counseling as recommended by agent, Maintain Full time work/Full time school, No Contact with S.A., B.L., Pawn America (Schofield), Downtown Pawn (Wausau), Restitution to be paid pursuant to Restitution Order, Court Costs. COURT finds 214 days credit granted towards all files.

13CM479:
Ct. 1 (Theft-Movable Property-Repeater)>> 2 years WSPS, 1 year IC and 1 years ES, concurrent to each Count and any sentence currently being served. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, AODA and follow up, Counseling as recommended by agent, Maintain Full time work/Full time school, No Contact with S.A., B.L., Pawn America (Schofield), Downtown Pawn (Wausau), Restitution to be paid pursuant to Restitution Order, Court Costs. COURT finds 214 days credit granted towards all files.

15CF134:
Ct. 2 (BJ-Felony)>> 4 years WSPS, 1 year IC and 3 years ES, concurrent to each Count and any sentence currently being served. CONDITIONS: Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, AODA and follow up, Counseling as recommended by agent, Maintain Full time work/Full time school, No Contact with S.A., B.L., Pawn America (Schofield), Downtown Pawn (Wausau), Restitution to be paid pursuant to Restitution Order, Court Costs including DNA Sample and Surcharge. COURT finds 214 days credit granted towards all files.

COURT Signs Restitution Order. 
REMANDED TO WSPS.

Adjourned: 3:08 pm
